main event: Multiple military personnel observed a light blue ball of flame during a UFO sighting at sea on March 17, 1962.
interesting points: The light was seen moving in a horizontal trajectory across the sky,It was observed for about 2-3 seconds before disappearing,The brightness of the light was attributed to its nearness,Military officers noted it was different from typical aircraft or missile sightings,The sighting occurred during nautical twilight and had characteristics resembling a meteor.
witness description: Commanding officer, Executive officer, and several senior officers
